221187A - Куб

Code
//Solution by Tima
#include <iostream>

#define pb push_back

#define pii pair<int, int>
using namespace std;          
const int N = int(3e5); 
int t;
ll n;

int main () {
		cin >> n;
		if(n == 1){
			cout << 1 << endl;
			return 0;
		}
		cout <<2*( n*n + n*(n-2) + (n-2) * (n-2)) << endl;

return 0;
}

221187B - Твердость графа

Code
//Solution by Tima
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <stack>
#include <queue>
#include <set>
#include <cstring>
#include <map>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <ctime>
#include <cassert>
#include <bitset>
#define f first
#define s second
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define vi vector <int>
#define ld long double
#define pii pair<int, int>
#define fname ""
using namespace std;    
const int N = int(3e5), mod = int(1e9)  + 7;

int n,m;
bool used[N];
int deg[N];
int mx,c1,c2;
vi g[N];

void dfs(int v){
	used[v] = 1;
	c2++;
	c1 += deg[v];
	for(int i = 0; i < g[v].size(); i++){
		int to = g[v][i];
		if(!used[to]) dfs(to);
	}
}

int main () {
	scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
	for(int i = 1,u,v; i <= m; i++){
		scanf("%d%d",&u,&v);
		g[u].pb(v);
		g[v].pb(u);	
		deg[u]++;
		deg[v]++;
	}
	bool ok = 0;

	for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++){
		if(!used[i]){
			c1 = 0;
			c2 = 0;
			dfs(i);
			c1 /= 2;
			if(c1 > c2){
				cout << ">1";
				return 0;
			}
			if(c1 == c2){
				ok = 1;
			}
			mx = max(mx,c1);
		}
	}
	if(ok){
		cout << "1/1";
	}
	else cout << mx << "/" << mx + 1;

return 0;
}

221187C - Интересные подотрезки

Code
//Solution by Tima
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <stack>
#include <queue>
#include <set>
#include <cstring>
#include <map>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <ctime>
#include <cassert>
#include <bitset>
#define f first
#define s second
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define vi vector <int>
#define ld long double
#define pii pair<int, int>
#define y1 sda
using namespace std;    
const int N = int(5e5) + 10, mod = int(1e9)  + 7; 

int t[4*N], a[N], n, b[N], bn, nxt[N], add[4*N];

void inc(int v,int x){
	add[v] += x;
	t[v] += x;
}

void push(int v){
	if(add[v] == 0) return;
	inc(v + v, add[v]);
	inc(v + v + 1, add[v]);
	add[v] = 0;
}

void upd(int v,int tl,int tr,int l,int r,int val){
	if(tl > r || l > tr) return;
	if(l <= tl && tr <= r){
		inc(v,val);
		return;
	}
	int tm = (tl + tr) >> 1;
	push(v);
	upd(v + v, tl, tm, l, r, val);
	upd(v + v + 1, tm + 1, tr, l, r, val);
	t[v] = min(t[v + v], t[v + v + 1]);
}

int get(int v,int tl,int tr, int pos){
	if(t[v] > 0 || tr < pos) return  -1;
	if(tl == tr)  return tl;
	int tm = (tl + tr) >> 1;
	push(v);
	int res = get(v + v, tl, tm, pos);
	if(res != -1) return res;
	return get(v + v + 1, tm + 1, tr, pos);
}

int val(int v,int tl,int tr,int l,int r){
	if(tl > r || l > tr) return N;
	if(l <= tl && tr <= r){
		return t[v];
	}
	int tm = (tl + tr) >> 1;
	push(v);
	return min( val(v + v, tl, tm, l, r), val(v + v + 1, tm + 1, tr, l, r));
}


int main () {
	scanf("%d", &n);
	for(int i = 1;i <= n; i++){
		scanf("%d", &a[i]);
		b[i] = a[i];
	}
	sort(b + 1, b + n + 1);
	bn = unique(b + 1, b + n + 1) - b - 1;
	for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++){
		a[i] = lower_bound(b + 1, b + n + 1, a[i]) - b - 1;
	}
	for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++){
		b[a[i]] = n + 1;
	}
	for(int i = n; i > 0; i--){
	    nxt[i] = b[a[i]];
	    b[a[i]] = i;
	}
	memset(b, -1, sizeof(b));
	for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++){
		if(b[a[i]] == -1){
			b[a[i]] = 1;
			upd(1,1,n,i, nxt[i] - 1,1);
		}
	}


	for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++){
		b[i] = get(1,1,n, i);
		if(b[i] == -1) b[i] = n + 1;
		if(nxt[i] != -1){
			upd(1,1,n,i, nxt[i] - 1, -1);
			int v = nxt[i];
			if(nxt[v] != -1){
				upd(1,1,n,v, nxt[v] - 1, 1);
			}
		}
	}
	int mn = n + 1;
	ll ans = 0;
	for(int i = n; i > 0; i--){
		mn = min(mn, b[i]);
		ans += (mn - i);
	}
	printf("%lld", ans);

return 0;
}

221187D - Ограбления

Code
//Solution by Tima
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <stack>
#include <queue>
#include <set>
#include <cstring>
#include <map>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <ctime>
#include <cassert>
#include <bitset>
#define f first
#define s second
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define vi vector <int>
#define ld long double
#define pii pair<int, int>
#define y1 sda
using namespace std;    
const int N = int(3e5), mod = int(1e9)  + 7;

int n,k, a[N], x[N];

int sz[2];
int b[2][N];
int d[2][3010][9010];
int c[2][3010][9010];

void add(int &a,int b){
	a += b;
	if(a >= mod) a -= mod; 
} 

void Add(int id, int x){
    b[id][++sz[id]] = x;
    for(int s = 0; s < (1<<13); s++){
    	d[id][sz[id]][s] = 0;
    	c[id][sz[id]][s] = 0;
    }
    for(int s = 0; s < (1<<13); s++) if(d[id][sz[id] - 1][s] > 0 || s == 0){
    	if(d[id][sz[id]][s^x] < d[id][sz[id] - 1][s] + x){
    		d[id][sz[id]][s^x] = d[id][sz[id] - 1][s] + x;
    		c[id][sz[id]][s^x] = 0;
    	}	
    	if(d[id][sz[id]][s^x] == d[id][sz[id] - 1][s] + x){
    		add(c[id][sz[id]][s^x], c[id][sz[id] - 1][s]);
    		add(c[id][sz[id]][s^x], c[id][sz[id] - 1][s]);
    	}
    }
    for(int s = 0; s < (1<<13); s++){
    	if(d[id][sz[id]][s] < d[id][sz[id] - 1][s]){
    		d[id][sz[id]][s] = d[id][sz[id] - 1][s];
    		c[id][sz[id]][s] = 0;
    	}
    	if(d[id][sz[id]][s] == d[id][sz[id] - 1][s]){
    		add(c[id][sz[id]][s], c[id][sz[id] - 1][s]);
    	}
    }
}

void del(){
	if(!sz[1]){
		while(sz[0] > 0){
			Add(1, b[0][sz[0]]);
			sz[0]--;
		}
	}
	sz[1]--;
}

void ans(){
    int mx = 0, cnt = 0;
    for(int s = 0; s < (1<<13); s++){
    	if(s == 0){
    		int cur_mx = d[0][sz[0]][s] + d[1][sz[1]][s];
    		int cur_cnt = 1ll * c[0][sz[0]][s] * c[1][sz[1]][s] % mod;
    		if(d[0][sz[0]][s] == 0){
    			cur_cnt = c[1][sz[1]][s]; 
    		}
    		if(d[1][sz[1]][s] == 0){
    			cur_cnt = c[0][sz[0]][s];
    		}
    		if(cur_mx > mx){
    			mx = cur_mx;
    			cnt = 0;
    		}
    		if(cur_mx == mx){
    			add(cnt, cur_cnt);
    		}
    		continue;
    	}
    	if(s > 0 && (d[0][sz[0]][s] == 0 || d[1][sz[1]][s] == 0)) continue;
    	int cur_mx = d[0][sz[0]][s] + d[1][sz[1]][s];
    	int cur_cnt = 1ll * c[0][sz[0]][s] * c[1][sz[1]][s] % mod;
    	if(cur_mx > mx){
    		mx = cur_mx;
    		cnt = 0;
    	}
    	if(cur_mx == mx){
    		add(cnt, cur_cnt);
    	}
    }
    printf("%d %d\n", mx, cnt);
}

int main () {
	c[0][0][0] = 1;
	c[1][0][0] = 1;
	scanf("%d %d", &n, &k);
	for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++){
		scanf("%d", &a[i]);
		Add(0, a[i]);
		if(i > k) del();
		if(i >= k) {
			ans();
		}
	}

return 0;
}
